content: {"name": "Welcome All Recreation Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Please arrive within the first 10 minutes of the start time to receive a bag of free produce.\nNo registration is required.\nMask-wearing is optional and based on your comfort level.", "email": "", "url": "https://extension.uga.edu/county-offices/fulton/fulton-fresh/mobile-market.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4255 Will Lee Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30349", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.6321508, "longitude": -84.52635219999999}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Mobile pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Fresh produce"}]}
